verses.verse: וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach the altar הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah of burnt offering עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> shit-Tim; [of] shittim חָמֵשׁ֩ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh five אַמּ֨וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot cubits אָרְכּ֜וֹ <S%H753><s%> a-re-Ko [was] the length וְחָֽמֵשׁ־ <S%H2568><s%> ve-cha-mesh- thereof and five אַמּ֤וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot cubits רָחְבּוֹ֙ <S%H7341><s%> ra-che-Bo the breadth רָב֔וּעַ <S%H7251><s%> ra-Vu-a', thereof [it was] foursquare וְשָׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> ve-sha-Losh and three אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot cubits קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6967><s%> ko-ma-To. the height

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he made קַרְנֹתָ֗יו <S%H7161><s%> kar-no-Tav, the horns עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' thereof on the four פִּנֹּתָ֔יו <S%H6438><s%> pin-no-Tav, corners מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu at הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu being קַרְנֹתָ֑יו <S%H7161><s%> kar-no-Tav; of it the horns וַיְצַ֥ף <S%H6823><s%> vay-Tzaf thereof were of the same and he overlaid אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet. it with brass

וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lei all the vessels הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach, of the altar אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַסִּירֹ֤ת <S%H5518><s%> has-si-Rot the pots וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיָּעִים֙ <S%H3257><s%> hai-ya-'Im and the shovels וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמִּזְרָקֹ֔ת <S%H4219><s%> ham-miz-ra-Kot, and the basons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּזְלָגֹ֖ת <S%H4207><s%> ham-miz-la-Got [and] the fleshhooks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמַּחְתֹּ֑ת <S%H4289><s%> ham-mach-Tot; and the firepans כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all כֵּלָ֖יו <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lav all the vessels עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah thereof made נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet. he [of] brass

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he made לַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> lam-miz-Be-ach for the altar מִכְבָּ֔ר <S%H4345><s%> mich-Bar, grate מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh act רֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> Re-shet network נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet; a brasen תַּ֧חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat beneath כַּרְכֻּבּ֛וֹ <S%H3749><s%> kar-kub-Bo under the compass מִלְּמַ֖טָּה <S%H4295><s%> mil-le-Mat-tah thereof beneath עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- reaching חֶצְיֽוֹ׃ <S%H2677><s%> chetz-Yo. unto the midst

וַיִּצֹ֞ק <S%H3332><s%> vai-yi-Tzok And he cast אַרְבַּ֧ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' four טַבָּעֹ֛ת <S%H2885><s%> tab-ba-'Ot rings בְּאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> be-'ar-Ba' for the four הַקְּצָוֹ֖ת <S%H7099><s%> hak-ke-tza-Vot ends לְמִכְבַּ֣ר <S%H4345><s%> le-mich-Bar of the grate הַנְּחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> han-ne-Cho-shet; of brass בָּתִּ֖ים <S%H1004><s%> bat-Tim [to be] places לַבַּדִּֽים׃ <S%H905><s%> lab-bad-Dim. for the staves

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבַּדִּ֖ים <S%H905><s%> hab-bad-Dim the staves עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> shit-Tim; [of] shittim וַיְצַ֥ף <S%H6823><s%> vay-Tzaf and overlaid אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet. them with brass

וַיָּבֵ֨א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve And he put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבַּדִּ֜ים <S%H905><s%> hab-bad-Dim the staves בַּטַּבָּעֹ֗ת <S%H2885><s%> bat-tab-ba-'Ot, into the rings עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on צַלְעֹ֣ת <S%H6763><s%> tzal-'Ot on the sides הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach, of the altar לָשֵׂ֥את <S%H5375><s%> la-Set to bear אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To בָּהֶ֑ם ba-Hem; נְב֥וּב <S%H5014><s%> ne-Vuv the altar hollow לֻחֹ֖ת <S%H3871><s%> lu-Chot with boards עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah it withal he made אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To. ס sa-Mek

וַיַּ֗עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as, And he made אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et הַכִּיּ֣וֹר <S%H3595><s%> hak-ki-Yor the laver נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet, [of] brass וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כַּנּ֣וֹ <S%H3653><s%> kan-No and the foot נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet; of it [of] brass בְּמַרְאֹת֙ <S%H4759><s%> be-mar-'Ot of the lookingglasses הַצֹּ֣בְאֹ֔ת <S%H6633><s%> hatz-Tzoe-'Ot, of [the women] assembling אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who צָֽבְא֔וּ <S%H6633><s%> tza-ve-'U, which assembled פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach [at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed. of the congregation ס sa-Mek

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הֶחָצֵ֑ר <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer; the court לִפְאַ֣ת׀ <S%H6285><s%> lif-'At side נֶ֣גֶב <S%H5045><s%> Ne-gev on the south תֵּימָ֗נָה <S%H8486><s%> tei-Ma-nah, southward קַלְעֵ֤י <S%H7050><s%> kal-'Ei the hangings הֶֽחָצֵר֙ <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer of the court שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> shesh linen מָשְׁזָ֔ר <S%H7806><s%> ma-she-Zar, [were of] fine twined מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah an hundred בָּאַמָּֽה׃ <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah. cubits

עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5982><s%> 'am-mu-dei-Hem Their pillars עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim, [were] twenty וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H134><s%> ve-'ad-nei-Hem sockets עֶשְׂרִ֖ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet; and their brasen וָוֵ֧י <S%H2053><s%> va-Vei the hooks הָעַמֻּדִ֛ים <S%H5982><s%> ha-'am-mu-Dim of the pillars וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2838><s%> va-cha-shu-kei-Hem and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef. [were of] silver

וְלִפְאַ֤ת <S%H6285><s%> ve-lif-'At side צָפוֹן֙ <S%H6828><s%> tza-fOn And for the north מֵאָ֣ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah [the hangings were] an hundred בָֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> va-'am-Mah, cubits עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5982><s%> 'am-mu-dei-Hem their pillars עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim, [were] twenty וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H134><s%> ve-'ad-nei-Hem and their sockets עֶשְׂרִ֖ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet; of brass וָוֵ֧י <S%H2053><s%> va-Vei the hooks הָֽעַמּוּדִ֛ים <S%H5982><s%> ha-'am-mu-Dim of the pillars וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2838><s%> va-cha-shu-kei-Hem and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef. [of] silver

וְלִפְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> ve-lif-'at- side יָ֗ם <S%H3220><s%> Yam, And for the west קְלָעִים֙ <S%H7050><s%> ke-la-'Im [were] hangings חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim of fifty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah, cubits עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H5982><s%> 'am-mu-dei-Hem their pillars עֲשָׂרָ֔ה <S%H6235><s%> 'a-sa-Rah, ten וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H134><s%> ve-'ad-nei-Hem and their sockets עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <S%H6235><s%> 'a-sa-Rah; ten וָוֵ֧י <S%H2053><s%> va-Vei the hooks הָעַמֻּדִ֛ים <S%H5982><s%> ha-'am-mu-Dim of the pillars וַחֲשׁוּקֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2838><s%> va-cha-shu-kei-Hem and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef. [of] silver

וְלִפְאַ֛ת <S%H6285><s%> ve-lif-'At side קֵ֥דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> Ke-de-mah And for the east מִזְרָ֖חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah eastward חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim fifty אַמָּֽה׃ <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah. cubits

קְלָעִ֛ים <S%H7050><s%> ke-la-'Im The hangings חֲמֵשׁ־ <S%H2568><s%> cha-mesh- fif עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh teen אַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah cubits אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַכָּתֵ֑ף <S%H3802><s%> hak-ka-Tef; of the one side עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5982><s%> 'am-mu-dei-Hem their pillars שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah, three וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H134><s%> ve-'ad-nei-Hem and their sockets שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah. three

וְלַכָּתֵ֣ף <S%H3802><s%> ve-lak-ka-Tef side הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit, And for the other מִזֶּ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh he וּמִזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> u-miz-Zeh he לְשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> le-Sha-'ar gate הֶֽחָצֵ֔ר <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer, of the court קְלָעִ֕ים <S%H7050><s%> ke-la-'Im on this hand and that hand [were] hangings חֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh fif עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh teen אַמָּ֑ה <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah; cubits עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5982><s%> 'am-mu-dei-Hem their pillars שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah, three וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H134><s%> ve-'ad-nei-Hem and their sockets שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah. three

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All קַלְעֵ֧י <S%H7050><s%> kal-'Ei All the hangings הֶחָצֵ֛ר <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer of the court סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv round about שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8336><s%> shesh linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <S%H7806><s%> ma-she-Zar. [were] of fine twined

וְהָאֲדָנִ֣ים <S%H134><s%> ve-ha-'a-da-Nim And the sockets לָֽעַמֻּדִים֮ <S%H5982><s%> la-'am-mu-Dim for the pillars נְחֹשֶׁת֒ <S%H5178><s%> ne-cho-Shet [were of] brass וָוֵ֨י <S%H2053><s%> va-Vei the hooks הָֽעַמּוּדִ֜ים <S%H5982><s%> ha-'am-mu-Dim of the pillars וַחֲשׁוּקֵיהֶם֙ <S%H2838><s%> va-cha-shu-kei-Hem and their fillets כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef, [of] silver וְצִפּ֥וּי <S%H6826><s%> ve-tzip-Pui and the overlaying רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H7218><s%> ra-shei-Hem of their chapiters כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef; [of] silver וְהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem like מְחֻשָּׁקִ֣ים <S%H2836><s%> me-chush-sha-Kim [were] filleted כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef, with silver כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol and all עַמֻּדֵ֥י <S%H5982><s%> 'am-mu-Dei and all the pillars הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer. of the court

וּמָסַ֞ךְ <S%H4539><s%> u-ma-Sach And the hanging שַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar for the gate הֶחָצֵר֙ <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer of the court מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh was the work רֹקֵ֔ם <S%H7551><s%> ro-Kem, of the weaver תְּכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> te-Che-let [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> sha-Ni and scarlet וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> ve-Shesh linen מָשְׁזָ֑ר <S%H7806><s%> ma-she-Zar; and fine twined וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah cubits אֹ֔רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech, [was] the length וְקוֹמָ֤ה <S%H6967><s%> ve-ko-Mah and the height בְרֹ֙חַב֙ <S%H7341><s%> ve-Ro-chav in the breadth חָמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh [was] five אַמּ֔וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot, cubits לְעֻמַּ֖ת <S%H5980><s%> le-'um-Mat answerable קַלְעֵ֥י <S%H7050><s%> kal-'Ei to the hangings הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer. of the court

וְעַמֻּֽדֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5982><s%> ve-'am-mu-dei-Hem And their pillars אַרְבָּעָ֔ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah, [were] four וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H134><s%> ve-'ad-nei-Hem and their sockets אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah four נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet; [of] brass וָוֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H2053><s%> va-vei-Hem their hooks כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef, [of] silver וְצִפּ֧וּי <S%H6826><s%> ve-tzip-Pui and the overlaying רָאשֵׁיהֶ֛ם <S%H7218><s%> ra-shei-Hem of their chapiters וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2838><s%> va-cha-shu-kei-Hem and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef. [of] silver
